uuid.description: Unique UUIDv4 identifier for this bag.

first_version_uuid.description: UUID of the first version of this bag.

ingest_node.description: Namespace of the node that originally ingest this bag.

admin_node.description: Namespace of the node that administers this bag.

member.description: UUIDv4 of the member who owns the bag

version.description: This bag's version number, beginning with 1.

bag_type.description: Single character specifying the type of this bag. 'D'->Data, 'I'->Interpretive, 'R'->Rights.

interpretive.description: Empty array or array of uuids of this bag's interpretive bags.

rights.description: Empty array or array of uuids of this bag's rights bags.

replication_nodes.description: Empty array or array of namespaces of this bag's replicating nodes.

created_at.description: DPN-formatted date-time when this record was first created

updated_at.description: DPN-formatted date-time when this record was last updated
